job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics

jd: From: Rukmini, 4-Serve Solutions rukmini@4-serveinc.com Reply to: rukmini@4-serveinc.com Cloud Data Engineer (Azure & Databricks)Dearborn, Michigan- OnsiteOnly Local to MI or IL(DL PROOF MUST) Job Summary: As a cloud engineer for Azure, you will be responsible for designing and implementing scalable, high-performance data engineering solutions using Azure Databricks and Azure Data Factory. Minimum Qualifications and Job Requirements:- Bachelor's degree in science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics. - 7+ years of experience as a data engineer, with strong proficiency in Azure cloud services, Databricks, and Azure Data Factory - 3+ years of experience with designing and implementing data solutions using Azure Cloud. - Azure Data Engineering or Databricks Certification. - Strong knowledge of programming languages such as Python, SQL, or Scala. - Experience with data modeling, ETL/ELT development, data integration and orchestration techniques - Experience with designing and developing end-to-end data and analytics solutions leveraging Azure Data Lake, Azure Databricks, and Data Factory *Nice to Have:* - Experience with designing scalable data analytics architecture to implement advanced analytics solutions, including machine learning and AI, to extract actionable insights from data. - Additional Azure Certifications like Azure ML, Analytics Specialty, or Azure Solutions Architect
